data.message: to install classes and components with autoloader

Omar but i am just a beginner in php,
Frankly i knew about composer from a course .. 
The instructor explained php basics .. And now he is going to build the first website in the course .. but he said he will use composer .. So i didn't understood anything

1)
If you want to use Library/Package X
and Library X requires package Y
then you need to know and install both X and Y manually , although you wanted X
with composer , you only specificy that you need x 
composer will search for what x wants and install it too 
this is simply dependency mgmt 
2)
when you add PSR-0 package,
composer uses that and creates auto-loader for you , that auto load all package class
3) 
it handles packages update hassle , for example If I want to update all libraries I use , I only need to 
composer update
4) 
post install scripts, some frameworks or packages add some post install , copy js/images to public_html

btw I highly recommend to take a look or even use Symfony framework 
will be tough , but you will learn more than you can Imagine 
http://symfony.com/
